meanings.definition: Flakiest: having a tendency to break into small, thin pieces
meanings.sent1: The pastry was the flakiest I had ever tasted.
meanings.sent2: She loved the flakiest croissants from the bakery.
meanings.sent3: The flakiest snowflakes fell gently from the sky.
meanings.sent4: Her delicate touch turned the dough into the flakiest crust.
meanings.sent5: The artist used the flakiest paint to create a textured masterpiece.

meanings.definition: Flakiest: unreliable or inconsistent in behavior or performance
meanings.sent1: His excuses for being late were always the flakiest.
meanings.sent2: The weather forecast turned out to be the flakiest prediction.
meanings.sent3: The flakiest bus driver always arrived at unexpected times.
meanings.sent4: Her flakiest friend never showed up when promised.
meanings.sent5: The flakiest Wi-Fi connection made it hard to work efficiently.
